video.title: Clifford's Puppy Days
video.synopsis: This cheery series takes little viewers back to Clifford the Big Red Dog's puppy days, when he has plenty of fun adventures with his animal pals.

episodes.synopsis: When Emily loses one of her "lucky" socks, Clifford is determined to find it. / While babysitting Emily and Clifford, Evan tries to impress a girl.
episodes.title: Socks and Snooze / Keeping Cool

episodes.synopsis: Clifford and the other animals are afraid to meet the Howards' new neighbors. / While their owner is away, kittens Flo and Zo stay with the Howards.
episodes.title: The Monster in 3-B / Cat-tastrophe

episodes.synopsis: Clifford and Jorge reminisce about the day they met and struck up a friendship. / Clifford decides to start a club with his friends in the building.
episodes.title: Jorge and the Dog Run / Clifford's Clubhouse

episodes.synopsis: Clifford accidentally gets paw prints on Emily's painting for the school art fair. / Clifford befriends a seeing-eye dog.
episodes.title: Paw Print Picasso / Hup Hup

episodes.synopsis: Daffodil feels left out when Clifford and Emily play with the "sock spider." / Jorge is reluctant to share his special new toy.
episodes.title: Sock It to Me / My Toy

episodes.synopsis: When an older dog moves into the building, she teaches Clifford and Jorge some new tricks. / Clifford misses Emily while she's away at a sleepover.
episodes.title: Friends of All Ages / Clifford's Super Sleepover

episodes.synopsis: When Clifford inadvertently joins Emily's class on a field trip, she and her friends try to hide him. / Clifford babysits the Sidarsky kids.
episodes.title: Clifford's Field Trip / Helping Paws

episodes.synopsis: Emily tries to save the day when Nina's birthday party is flooded out. / Clifford capitalizes on his small size to find Mrs. Howard's missing keys.
episodes.title: Nina's Perfect Party / Just the Right Size

episodes.synopsis: As Clifford helps set up for a Cinco de Mayo party, he wonders whether he has special skills to offer. / Shun make excuses for not playing volleyball.
episodes.title: Something Special / Shun Gets in the Game

episodes.synopsis: The year's first snowfall leaves Norville feeling sad and lonely. / Rather than admit she's not good at a new game, Flo says she'd rather play alone.
episodes.title: Clifford's Winter Spirit / Flo-Motion

episodes.synopsis: Nina alienates her new play's cast when she gets too bossy. / Embarrassed by the way he looks, a molting Norville refuses to let his friends see him.
episodes.title: No Small Parts, Only Small Puppies / Fine Feathered Friend

episodes.synopsis: Norville's off-key singing is driving everyone crazy. / When a snowstorm keeps Shun, Emily and Nina inside, Shun finds a way to relieve their boredom.
episodes.title: Sing-a-Song Norville / Tell Me a Tale

episodes.synopsis: When Evan joins the school basketball team, he's discouraged because of his height. / Jorge accidentally rips the new sweater that Nina knit for him.
episodes.title: Hoop Dreams / Doggie Duds

episodes.synopsis: When Norville's nest disappears, his friends bicker as they build him a new one. / Emily gets discouraged while taking art lessons from Mr. Solomon.
episodes.title: The Best Nest / Practice Makes Perfect

episodes.synopsis: Clifford wants to impress a female puppy on Valentine's Day but uses the wrong approach. / The animals try to influence Shun's choice for a new pet.
episodes.title: Your Secret Valentine / Perfect Pet

episodes.synopsis: Emily gets upset when Nina reveals something told to her in confidence. / After Clifford rescues Jorge, he goes overboard with his gratitude.
episodes.title: My Blanky / With Friends Like You

episodes.synopsis: When Nina loses her datebook, Jorge decides not to help her find it. / When Emily wakes up with a cold, Clifford attempts to make her feel better.
episodes.title: Time Out / Sniff, Sniff

episodes.synopsis: Evan promises to teach Emily skateboarding but repeatedly cancels the lessons. / Nina comes up with a perfect plan for winning a set of mystery books.
episodes.title: A Promise Is a Promise / Share and Share Alike

episodes.synopsis: A huge snowstorm leaves the Howards stranded at the train station. / The animals invent games, and Norville keeps changing the rules so he can win.
episodes.title: Fall Feast / Norville's New Game

episodes.synopsis: Daffodil helps Lucy adjust to the new baby in the Sidarsky family. / Shun saves the day when Emily and Nina have trouble making kites.
episodes.title: Oh, Brother / Up, Up, & Oops!

episodes.synopsis: Clifford offers to help the Sidarskys move to a new mouse hole but gets distracted. / Emily and Nina volunteer to read to kids at the book fair.
episodes.title: Moving On / Fair Is Fair

episodes.synopsis: Some misinformation makes Jorge nervous about going to the grooming shop. / On their way to buy concert tickets, Evan and Emily get sidetracked.
episodes.title: Grooming Gloom / The Letter

episodes.synopsis: Evan, Emily and Clifford help at the neighborhood street fair's Adopt-a-Pup booth. / On Wacky Wednesday at school, Nina goes too far with her jokes.
episodes.title: Adopt-a-Pup / Jokes on You

episodes.synopsis: Emily, Nina and Shun try to make a documentary about people in the neighborhood. / Evan gets tickets to see his hero, Allan Houston, play basketball.
episodes.title: Lights, Camera, Action / Basketball Babysitter

episodes.synopsis: When the dessert buffet is raided at the Halloween party, all evidence points to Clifford. / Clifford accidentally breaks Daffodil's spinning top.
episodes.title: The Halloween Bandit / An Honest Spin

episodes.synopsis: Clifford and Jorge ditch their new playmate when he plays too rough. / The kids start a newspaper and fill it with stories from the neighborhood.
episodes.title: Puppy Dog Power / Extra! Extra!

episodes.synopsis: Clifford becomes dispirited by his small size. / Norville claims to know where to find Aladdin's magic lamp.
episodes.title: Small Packages / Clifford's Magic Lamp

episodes.synopsis: When Jorge digs up a necklace, he thinks finders should be keepers. / Nina and Jorge become celebrities when they get their pictures in the paper.
episodes.title: Finders Keepers / You're Famous

episodes.synopsis: Emily and Nina take part in a sandcastle competition at the beach. / The puppies want to go to school just like the kids do.
episodes.title: Sandcastle Hassle / School Daze

episodes.synopsis: The kids try to turn a vacant lot into a garden, but the job becomes chaotic without teamwork. / The gang tries to fix broken toys by planting them.
episodes.title: Celebrating Spring / Garden Delights

episodes.synopsis: Evan goes too far when he plays tricks on the kids. / At a Halloween campout party, Clifford is spooked by unfamiliar sounds.
episodes.title: Clifford the Scary Puppy / Things That Go Bump

episodes.synopsis: Clifford attempts to throw a surprise birthday party for Daffodil, but his plan falls apart. / When Norville injures his wing, Emily takes him in.
episodes.title: The Big Surprise / Be My Guest

episodes.synopsis: Clifford claims he saw a flying dinosaur and a floating teddy bear, but nobody believes him. / Mr. Solomon's potato pancakes don't turn out well.
episodes.title: But I Really, Really Saw It! / The Perfect Pancake

episodes.synopsis: After promising to play with Lewis, Clifford plays ball with his friends instead. / Evan uses his new magic kit and thinks he's made Clifford vanish.
episodes.title: Clifford's Little Friend / Tricky Business

episodes.synopsis: The kittens accidentally break a menorah and attempt to fix it. / Zo can't resist opening all of his presents on the first night of Hanukkah.
episodes.title: The Big, Big Present / Hanukah Plunder Blunder

episodes.synopsis: For her show-and-tell exhibition, Emily explains how she cares for Clifford. / Daffodil tells the Sidarsky kids a tale fit for rabbits but not people.
episodes.title: Show and Tell / What a Story

episodes.synopsis: Clifford tries to be a hero to impress Emily. / Things get out of hand when the kids make cookies to thank Mrs. Z for giving them candy canes.
episodes.title: Heroes and Friends / The Cookie Crumbles

episodes.synopsis: When her stuffed bunny vanishes, Daffodil blames Clifford. / Emily and her friends play against the kids on Mr. Solomon's wheelchair-basketball team.
episodes.title: Lost and Found / Basketball Blunders

episodes.synopsis: Clifford and Daffodil compete to make Emily the best gift for Valentine's Day. / Emily is uneasy about dancing in front of a crowd.
episodes.title: Valentine Schmalentine / Sweethearts Dance
